title: Add privacy/retention note for shares and local annotations
description: Add a short, plain-language note explaining that share codes expire after 7 days and that annotations are stored locally in the browser (localStorage). Place it near the share controls or start-annotating CTA.
acceptance_criteria:
Note is visible on the input/share screen without scrolling on desktop.
Copy mentions 7-day share expiration and local-only annotation storage.
Wording is concise and does not block the primary workflow.

title: Fix lint failure caused by worker/.wrangler temp file
description: Running npm run lint fails due to ESLint errors in worker/.wrangler/tmp/dev-*/index.js (generated). Consider updating lint config to ignore worker temp output or clean the directory before lint.

title: Add CLI setup page with installation instructions
description: Create a /cli (or /setup) page with installation and usage instructions for the CLI. Include: what it does, install command, usage examples, and requirements (bash, curl). Link to it from the main page or header.
acceptance_criteria:
Route is reachable directly (no 404 on refresh) and linked from the main UI.
Page includes: purpose, install command, usage examples, and requirements.
Copy is concise and ready for public users.

title: Add SEO essentials: meta tags, Open Graph, robots.txt, sitemap
description: Add basic SEO and link-preview assets for the public site: meta tags in index.html, Open Graph/Twitter tags, robots.txt, sitemap.xml, and a canonical URL. Include an OG image in public/.
acceptance_criteria:
index.html includes title/description, Open Graph, and Twitter Card tags.
public/robots.txt allows crawling and points to sitemap.xml.
public/sitemap.xml lists the main page (and /cli if added).
Open Graph image asset is present and referenced by tags.

title: Add analytics
description: Add basic analytics to understand usage. Choose one implementation (Cloudflare Web Analytics, Plausible/Fathom, or Worker-based logging) and instrument the minimal events needed.
acceptance_criteria:
One analytics option is selected and implemented.
Tracks at least: page views, share create, share retrieval, and Copy All usage.
No PII is collected; document the choice and instrumentation in README.

title: Surface share API errors in UI
description: Display specific error messaging for share create/load based on API error responses and network failures. Handle invalid_request, content_too_large (500KB), invalid_code/not_found, server_error, and network/timeout cases. Surface messages in the input view/share modal without leaking raw stack traces.
acceptance_criteria:
Creating a share with >500KB shows a clear "content too large" message in the UI.
Loading an invalid/expired code shows an actionable message and a clear path to start fresh.
Network/5xx errors show a retry-friendly message.
Unknown errors fall back to the generic error copy.

title: Update default API URL to specmark.dev
description:
Update all localhost defaults to use the production domain:
- src/config.js: VITE_API_URL default
- cli/annotate-md: ANNOTATE_API_URL default
- Any documentation references
close_reason: Updated all defaults to use https://specmark.dev with path-based routing (/api/*). Created public/_routes.json for Cloudflare Pages routing configuration. Updated README with complete deployment instructions.

title: Improve default feedback format and add customization options
description: Enhance the Copy All export format with a clearer default layout and a small settings UI. Settings should include a customizable prefix/header and a toggle to include line numbers in quoted selections. Persist settings in localStorage.
acceptance_criteria:
Default export format is improved (readable header + per-annotation separator or numbering).
Settings UI lets users edit a prefix/header and toggle line numbers.
Export output respects settings and remains valid Markdown.
Settings persist across reloads via localStorage.

title: Add favicon
description: Add a favicon set for the site, including .ico, .svg, and an Apple touch icon. Wire them up in index.html.
acceptance_criteria:
favicon.ico and favicon.svg are present in public/.
apple-touch-icon.png is present and referenced.
index.html links to the favicon assets so they show in browser tabs and mobile bookmarks.

title: Highlighting doesn't work for table elements
Audit error states for invalid/expired share codes
description:
Review and improve error handling UX:
- Invalid share code (doesn't exist)
- Expired share code (TTL passed)
- API unavailable/network error
- Rate limited (if applicable)

Ensure users see helpful messages, not raw errors or blank states.

title: Add onboarding/help content to main page
description: Add onboarding/help content on the main input page describing what Specmark is and the basic workflow (paste markdown → annotate → copy feedback), plus how sharing works (6-char codes, 7-day expiration). Keep it unobtrusive for returning users.
acceptance_criteria:
Help content is visible on the input page without blocking editing.
Includes tool purpose, 3-step workflow, and share-code + 7-day expiration info.
If collapsible/dismissible, it remembers the user choice for the session or via localStorage.

title: Improve comment dialog accessibility (focus trap + restore focus)
description: Ensure CommentDialog traps focus while open and returns focus to the triggering element when closed (selection tooltip or list item). Preserve Escape-to-close behavior and initial focus on the textarea.
acceptance_criteria:
Tab/Shift+Tab cycle within the dialog without escaping to the page.
Focus returns to the element that opened the dialog after close.
Escape closes the dialog and restores focus correctly.
Textarea is focused on open.
